Procurement Officer Job at Ascentech Services Limited




        
    

        
        Ascentech Services Limited is a full-fledged Human Resource Solution Provider incorporated in 2013 with its Head Office in Lagos, Nigeria. We are committed to forging long-term partnerships with our clients by creating and delivering robust and flexible services that address the changing needs of their business.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Procurement Officer

Job Location: Ibadan, Oyo
Employment Type: Full-time
Urgency: Immediate / High Priority

Job Summary
     

            
    




	We are urgently seeking a Procurement Officer with strong SAP ERP expertise and proven experience in spare parts procurement to support efficient sourcing, purchasing, and inventory management operations.
	The ideal candidate will ensure timely availability of materials and spare parts while maintaining cost control, compliance, and accurate system documentation.


Key Responsibilities


	Manage end-to-end procurement of spare parts, consumables, and operational materials.
	Create and process purchase requisitions, purchase orders, and GRNs using SAP ERP.
	Source, evaluate, and negotiate with suppliers to ensure quality, cost-effectiveness, and timely delivery.
	Maintain accurate procurement records, supplier data, and pricing in SAP.
	Monitor stock levels of spare parts and coordinate replenishment to avoid downtime.
	Liaise with maintenance, stores, and finance teams to align procurement needs.
	Ensure compliance with company procurement policies and approval processes.
	Track supplier performance and resolve supply-related issues promptly.
	Support audits by providing procurement documentation and reports.
	Identify cost-saving opportunities and improve procurement efficiency.


Requirements & Qualifications


	Bachelor’s degree or HND in Procurement, Supply Chain, Business Administration, Engineering, or a related field.
	3–5 years of experience in a procurement role.
	Strong hands-on experience with SAP ERP (mandatory).
	Proven experience in spare parts procurement, preferably in manufacturing or industrial environments. (Mandatory)
	Good understanding of inventory control and vendor management.
	Strong negotiation, communication, and analytical skills.
	Ability to work under pressure and meet urgent procurement timelines.
	High level of integrity and attention to detail.


Salary
N300,000 - N350,000 Monthly.

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: cv@ascentech.com.ng using “Procurement Officer" as the subject of the mail.

Sales Executive Job at DreamWorks Global Logistics Limited

We have a precise customer-focused strategy that addresses our customers’ supply chain requirements seamlessly. We know how to deliver!

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Sales Executive

Job Location: Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description
     

            
    




	We are seeking a highly motivated and results-driven Sales Executive with a strong background in logistics to join our team.
	This role involves identifying new business opportunities, developing client relationships, and driving revenue growth through the sale of logistics services.
	The ideal candidate will have a solid understanding of logistics operations, supply chain management, and transportation solutions, along with excellent sales and communication skills.


Responsibilities


	Generate new leads and identify potential clients in the logistics and transportation sectors.
	Promote the company’s logistics services, including freight forwarding, supply chain solutions, and transportation management.
	Conduct product presentations, demonstrations, and meetings to drive sales and close deals.
	Negotiate contracts and pricing with clients to ensure mutually beneficial agreements.
	Meet or exceed sales targets, KPIs, and revenue goals set by the company.
	Maintain accurate sales records, customer data, and reports in the CRM system.


Requirements


	Bachelor’s Degree in Business, Logistics, Supply Chain Management, or a related field (preferred).
	2 - 5 years of experience in sales, with at least 2 years in the logistics or transportation industry.
	Active client database.


Skills:


	Strong understanding of logistics, supply chain management, and transportation solutions.
	Proven track record of achieving sales targets and generating new business.
	Excellent communication, negotiation, and interpersonal skills.
	Ability to work independently and as part of a team in a fast-paced environment.


Salary
N200,000 - N250,000 per month.

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: dglhrexecutive@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

  "description": "Worknigeria was established with a Singular Vision. To help the vast Nigerian workforce find meaningful jobs. We are also on a mission to upskill them in the best ways possible and help them grow with and within their careers.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Junior Project Manager, Civil Engineering (High-Rise Buildings)
Job Location:&nbsp;Osborne, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

About the Role
